content.detailedDescription:
It was around 1.40 at night friday 14th of march 2014 when i heard a sound from outside of my flat. in the beginning i thought it was a car waiting with the engine turned on. after a while it started getting distant but not disappearing. i opened one window to see who it is but no car outside. it was a noise like a big vibrating roar. i thought it might be the central heating of the building but immediately i realized it was coming from the top of the next building. like it was hovering above it. then it started moving around, at that point i realized that something is not quite right. i couldn't see anything. the night was not a dark night, i could clearly distinguish the horizon over the hilltop nearby and the lights of the area was helping to that as well. then it hovered around the area for a little while and after it started going away. at this point i could clearly hear its direction and estimate its position by its sound but i could see nothing. it went quite far and stayed for some time at that distance. then it started coming back and i closed the window because i was afraid. but after a while i opened again the other window of my flat and i heard it hovering slowly around and stopped above a school football field just outside my building. it stayed there for a few minutes and then started coming towards my direction. i was scared but i tried to stay at my window. i couldn't see anything all this time but i could hear it very distinctly. it came towards my direction and passed right above my building, i even bent over the window as it was passing over the building just in case i see something, but i couldn't see anything. it sounded like it was something big, there is no way something of that size to come so close and i couldn't see it. at that moment i heard its sound better than any other moment, it was like a fast roar and when closer it had a vibrating feel and a slight metallic sound to it. at that point i got scared and i closed the window. i could hear it being out there for another 15 minutes and then it went away. when after 1 hour or so i opened the window, it was dead silent outside. i even thought the possibility that it was only my idea to hear the sound but the fact that when i closed the window the sound was damped, it was indicating that it was outside.

also i don't know if that is connected somehow to that object but the following morning at 8.30 when i went to work, the company next to the one i work had smoke next to it and the workers where running around like they wanted to distinguish a fire. i really believe that these two events are not connected to each other but i thought to mention this last one too, just in case it helps any research.

i know my data are not sufficient to really identify the object because i couldn't see anything really, but i thought to submit my experience just in case there is any other witness from that event from the nearby area. i really didn't think to take my camera and film the situation because i was scared at that moment.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: No sighting, just hovering sound.

content.detailedDescription: Building snowforts in front yards with friends when large ball of light hovered on other side of street just above lamp post for few minutes neighbor threw snowball towards light then shot away at very high speed made local newspaper and later found out when i was older people down my street wlth pictures where visited buy government done know who's but pictures where confiscated
content.summary: Hovering light at lamp post level in a residential area no noise and shot off at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
I usually go to princeton nj to do work on mondays but for uninteresting reasons i drove all the way up there and it was cancelled. so i drove back home and decided to chill for the day. i had my jeep top down and a jacket on because it was a little chilly. i went to a liquor store and got a six pack...I bought it at 9:10 am because i had to call them because they forgot to open the doors (it's a large roger wilco on rt 73 in palmyra. i then drove to a half mile from my house where there is a soccer field and park and i was by myself and turned off the jeep and cracked open a beer or two and just relaxed looking up at the sky which was easy because my jeep top was down. 
in the distance a jogger was running by and i wanted to get a good look at her and remembered my binoculars in the back that i keep on the floor. i use them to look at ships on the deleware river when i park there and crack open a few beers. i looked at her, and then looked at a car or two driving by and then looked up at some airplanes making there way to the philly airport. 
i had another beer and then took the binoculars and looked up at some of the clouds and watched them for a moment or two...Just relaxing and enjoying myself listening to some ambient music. then i focused in on a large bird just hovering as they do in the wind stream and it was a perfect moment...And then i saw it. 

it just seemed so casual and natural, i only saw it for about 3 to 4 seconds but the split second i saw it i thought it was a bird like a seagull or something because it was white and (maybe) had a black part in the front. i'm not sure about that though. i instantly realized it was not a bird...It was round and it was moving fast. from my left to right. i followed it until it went behind a tree that was in front of me and i knew i would not be able to pick it up again on the other side of the tree because even if i did pick it up it would disappear instantly behind more trees.

it was pretty high in the air but it was not overhead. if you bent your head and looked straight up, and then lowered your head and looked at the horizon, it was about halfway...But just slightly closer to being straight up than horizon level. it was moving straight across...It was white...White like the white on space shuttles and old nasa rockets...Exactly that white. i think there was black somewhere on it to (in the front?) but i really couldn't recall after i saw it. even though it was rather small in my binoculars...I would estimate it's size to be somewhere between a very large beachball (the kind they hit around at concerts) and a volkeswagon bug. i doubt it was smaller than the beachball and doubt it was larger than the car. if i had to guess, i think it was closer to being almost as big as a car...But that's really a guess. 
it was traveling fast...Really fast...But not faster than an airforce jet...Probably as fast as a jet, but definetly not faster than one.

as soon as it happened i though...Did i just see a drone? then instantly realized that i saw something that was either an experimental drone or aircraft...Or something from another world. it didn't make sense to me that it would be something from the govt because if it malfunctioned  and came crashing down, in a highly populated area like i live...It would have done some damage.
the day was sunny and the object was solid and very white...It didn't shine or reflect light...Just very white. it would not have been possible to see it without binoculars.
content.summary: White ball like object moving fast and straight on a sunny day

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping, as it was like 3;40 am.  the lights were so bright, they woke me up,. i have blinds on my bedroom window, with slits. my bed is facing north but the window is south and the flying object was southwestern. it was not there when i went to bed (around 10pm). and it was no longer there after the episode. i was staring in awe at it for about 5 minutes before i decided to record. i was nervous, i really wanted to hide under covers, and barely open blinds, as i was afraid they would get me if i opened blinds all the way. i mean, they were angled almost perfectly at my window. were they there for me? anyways i saw bright white, green, pink lights. i dont think i heard noise, since my window is shut. the orbs morphed - got bigger smaller, and changed shapes and the whole object hovered and went slightly side to side, making the lights more and less bright and visible/prominent. i finally recorded, and by then the lights were only white. i was low on memory on my phone, otherwise i would have recorded more, but ran out of memory, my cell phone cut me off.  i was quickly deleted files,pics, etc so i could record more, and i had to use the bathroom, but then they were gone. i was freaked out, but also excited that i had seen something so cool! i verified it by googling images of ufos and time sighting of them and yep, this was one. and also they seem to appear on dark quiet nites like at 4am. i made sure it wasnt any cosmic sighting like meteor showers or auroras, and nope, none, and it was not the moon, as the moon was on the other side of the sky. i was so excited it took me a while to fall back asleep. when i did, i woke up at 830am and couldnt wait to tell my loved ones.
content.summary: So bright it woke me up. pink, green, white lights as bright as bright headlights, hovered and orbs morphed.

content.detailedDescription: When this close encounter happened i was walking back home from the gym and right above the rooftops of the corner house of the main road i was walking down was a slow moving flying saucer shaped craft. it was plain as day and unavoidable it was impossible not to see.I could not identify it as any known craft but i must have believed it was extraterrestrial because i telepathically tried to communicate to it not to leave. it was blue and silver and was right above me and had a blinking white light. i was trying to send telepathic messages to the beings inside and telling them not to go. it moved north slowly across the street and then changed directions heading east keeping the same speed the entire time until i lost sight of it while ascending it then changed directions and headed north. i watched it until i couldn't see it anymore. it lasted for about five minutes until i lost sight due to it being out of range with the naked eye it finally crossed over the foothills.After reviewing and embossing the video i took there appear to be 3 more objects that stand out just like the one i had my camera directed at but these other three were not close to me like the one i described.After i lost sight of it i posted the event to facebook and reported it to the san francisco office of senator feinstein's office where i have an open case with the us air force. i also requested radar tracking data from the cia and nasa in a foia request form describing the date, time, location, description of the phenomenon.
content.summary: During daylight, above a residential home, while walking, was moving slow, blue and silver, blinking white light. about 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Riding in a car with two other witnesses . we turned out of my drive way and all notice a giant plane shaped object floating above the tree line.  we were at a lost of words for the few minutes which felt like forever. frightened we backed into the drive way and the object then vanished without us noticing any movement, almost like it disappeared.
content.summary: Giant long object with box window like lights along the whole object. hovering for mins.

content.detailedDescription: I was  on my was to a restaurant for lunch, when i looked up at the sky. beautiful, blue sky with no clouds. that's when i saw the object. it was right above the tree lines, and i thought it was a plane. then i noticed it was not moving and appeared to not have any wings. the object was white/silver in color.  cylinder in shape and about the size of an aircraft.
content.summary: I saw something that resembled a plane, but it did not have wings and it was not moving. white/silver in color, and cylinder shaped.

content.detailedDescription: I see it almost every night in the same location around same time. it moves in rotation with the earth and stars but it flashes lights in a sequential order. seems brighter than a star. it will move left to right go up down. i am pretty fascinated by this and there is a lot of military activity in the are. planes in high altitude with red sensors that stay lit red no flashing. there is a lot of strange things in the skies around here i managed to snap a picture. i zoomed in at 400% on picasa now my camera on phone will not take pictures of stars. i was shocked when i seen when i zoomed it in look to the almost bottom left. i red eyed it and got an eerie round shape. you guys are professionals it's in you hands. there were multiple of these lights that i didnt see by my own eyes eye just saw one. they are out here like every night.
content.summary: Craft hovers then slightly will move left to right up and down.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been speaking to spirit a lot but here lately aliens. six crafts hovered over the area late last night but for the most of today i have been speaking to aliens and they want to achieve contact and tell you their alphabet so you can talk to them.
please contact me and i will give you the alphabet and their message.
their main message is we are love and wish to have peace with all people.
there is much more to say. [name moved/cms/rjl]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Human like with ears communication

content.detailedDescription: Rectangle/ silver or gray,,had one long wing like or tube like object on side that was coming to words us,had some kind of red writing or red scribble on it. watched it come to words us down road and go over top us because we were standing on the road, it followed the road line till we could not see it anymore.
content.summary: Husband and i sitting outside when we saw a large gray/white rectangle object with one long object coming out from the side of it, red on the side of it, flying above road line, low enough to see it only had one object on one side and red on it.

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed this mark this morning.  it was too strange to ignore beings i don't recall anything that could have caused it.  its flat and resembles a tattoo like appearance.  very little to no pain.
content.summary: Found strange triangular shaped mark on left arm.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside when i heard a humming noise above me. it all happened so fast and im incredibly exhausted. the only thing i remember when it was maybe 20 feet above me was the noise, the bright colored lights, and immediately thinking it was a drone. however, if it was a drone, it moved mighty fast, because from i barely had time to process what was going on. it zoomed away incredibly fast. since i found that odd, i was able to take a 3 minute video
content.summary: Red/white/pink/blue object with humming noise

content.detailedDescription: On this night i observed two craft in the sky about a mile away. these craft hover in one place moving in tight random movements, ie: zigzag, pendulum, figure 8. one was flame colored and appeared to emmit flames and light. the other was white, blue, and green with jewel toned lights. these craft flashed pulsed and strobed. and emmited gloing orbs that shot across the sky or at an angle to the ground they where ejected with great velocity. and occadionaly let of a flash of light simular to a flash grenade. when the orbs were ejected over the farm across the street the cows made loud distressed noises. the next evening at 3a.M. i got up to shut my bedtoom window. and saw a round craft 30 to 40 feet in diameter and about 50 or 60 feet away decend rapidly straight down ftom 500 feet to below the trees. apearing to land in woods behind the neighbors house. i hope this report is taken seriously. this is my third attempt to file this report as either the pics did not apear or could not find the rrport. please view the photos as they are amazing.
content.summary: Observed 2 craft in sky one flame looking, the other white blue and green.   they both morphed shape and at times appeared to seperate.I

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard when i heard a humming noise. i looked up and all i can remember was seeing an object with bright colored lights. from the moment i saw it, to it hoovering high in the sky, happened so fast. i was able to capture it on video, and listen you can hear the humming noise.
content.summary: Heard a humming noise, it was right above me, before i could process what it was it zoomed away then hoovered then change direction

content.detailedDescription:
1)skyping friend in different state.
2)lights skimming treeline.
3)plane
4)the object was a black triangle with three lights. it came from the southeast and went north. steady straight, faster than a plane, slightly over tree line. 
5)it caught my attention because of the bright roundness of the lights. i stared at it for a few seconds (6-8). i live near an airport, planes are normal. i know the speeds. this wasn't as big as a jet. it was faster than a jet. especially at such low altitude. i was shocked. i immediately picked up the computer and looked outside and attempted to show the people on my skype what was occurring. the person claimed to have seen lights, but when i asked they said they saw a circle. it was not a circle, but a triangle. i was excited, but wished it had been recorded. there simply was not time.
6)the object maintained its straight course to the other side of the property where i was no longer able to track it.
content.summary: Black triangle.Three lights. one on each point. over tree line. fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was at arbor lodge park in north portland, or on august 17th, 2014 for a movies in the park event.  they were showing "back to the future".  it was about 9pm, right before the movie started, and i noticed a light in the sky to the west, off in the distance in the direction of forest park.  at first i thought it might be a police helicopter in the distance, but the light colors started changing (between white/yellow, red/orange and light blue/white), although the exact hues are a bit fuzzy as it's been over a month since the event.  what i clearly remember, so vividly that i felt compelled to share it with someone, anyone, is how is started to zip around the sky.  for the next fifteen minutes or so, it would zig and zag across the skyline in a manner that just baffled me.  it would stop every so often and just hover for a few minutes, then with no warning, shoot across the sky in different directions.  it was as if someone had a laser pointer pointed at the sky and was just playing around with it.  i tried to talk with my party about it, but they all seemed more interested in the movie.  eventually it zagged behind the inflatable screen they were playing the movie on and i settled into watching the movie, checking the sky a few times later, but seeing nothing.  i don't know what that zipping light was, but i've never seen anything move like that in the sky.  i really don't know what to think about it.
content.summary: Patternless light zigs and zags in unnatural way though the portland night skies

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway (indianapolis and newland) and saw a strange hovering aircraft with a bright blue light that changed to red and then white. it was a smaller aircraft but it was impossible to judge how far away it was. the aircraft made fast turns in directions as though it was a drone, but no regular aircraft could make such swift turns or move that way as though it was standing still, then moving slowly but quickly changing directions. then it just slowly moved away and a tree was blocking my view, so i moved to see where it was but it suddenly disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Unidentifiable aircraft with blue, red, and white lights over huntington beach

content.detailedDescription: Monday night in avon, ohio- usually pretty boring.  went outside around 11 pm to smoke a cigarette, i always gaze up to the sky,  when i did, i saw a bright light to the west.  it was moving slowly upwards or i guess that would be eastward  at first i thought it was the intn'l space station so i went in to grab binoculars for a better look.  was gone only a minute or less- when i came back out, it was gone so i figure it either blinked out or sped way up.  at any rate it seemed really far away.  too bad  i couldn't get a closer look.  but one thing about it-  it did appear in the same general area that i saw a group of u.F.O.'s one night with my son in the spring of this year.
content.summary: Went out at around 11 pm, saw slow moving bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car on my way home from work traveling southbound on highway 270.  i was traveling between 60-65 mph. it was still rush hour traffic. it was still a clear,bright day at that hour.  between big bend and marshall road there is a clearing on the right side of the highway that gives a very good view of part of fenton and valley park, as well as a bit of unger park.  as the clearing afforded me this view, i then saw the object.  it was metallic grey.  it was the shape of a cylinder with a sphere above it.  the cylinder was perpendicular to the ground.  it was hovering.  it appeared to have many different mechanical devices attached to its "hull."  the largest of these objects appeared to be support beams that attached the cylinder to the sphere.  there were many of these support beams and they appeared to be very sturdy.  it was very difficult to get a frame of reference as to its size, relative position to the highway, and how far above the treetops it was.  i will say it was a very large object, probably at least, the size of a small 4 to 5 story office skyscraper. it made no noise, but i may have had the windows open and my radio on, which of course may have drowned out any noise the object was making.  at first i thought it could be a balloon of some sort, but i dismissed that idea because of the metallic nature of the object and the fact that there is no balloon that i know of that would have that many objects attached to its surface.  it simply hovered in place the entire time it was in my field of view.   i was in shock at first, then i was excited and elated.  i had a great need to see it again and even considered diverting my course and attempting to track it down.  i lost site of it due to trees and cliffs that blocked the view of any vehicles traveling southbound until you reach the i-44/270 interchange, which is a very large valley.  i looked back when i reached this point and the object was gone. it took approximately 30 seconds to reach this next visible viewing area.  i am fairly certain it was high enough that had it remained in place i would have at least seen the top of it at that point.
content.summary: I saw a stationary, hovering object in the air, while driving on my way home from work.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in down town huntington beach, ca ~ 7:30 pm and had just gotten into my car, i was driving and looked into  the distance and saw a blue light hovering in the north east direction of the corner of first st. and olive. the light appeared to be over to the direction of beach boulevard and atlanta. at first i thought it was a helicopter but usually they are red and green. i observed the light change colors with both red and white at once and then just blue, there was a bit of wobble to the light and it was moving back and forth. i stopped my car and observed this for a few minutes as some others walked by. the light started moving further ne slowly, i got back into my vehicle to follow it down altedena blvd but was unable to locate it, it had disappeared.

not sure if this was a helicopter or a drone, but there was no search light and i didn't hear the sound. i was probably a mile to two miles from the object. there were other air planes on their usual route through the city.

hoping someone else observed this too. i have a photo from my camera but it turned out fairly poor. will try to upload later.
content.summary: Saw blue light that changed to white and red hovering and wobbling around in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Coming back from dinner, my fianc√© and i observed a line of eight glowing yellow - orange - red circular objects in the sky.  they were lined up in a linear manner and seemed to appear out of dark and then moved east, following 40 east.  they moved at a speed faster than a hot air balloon (this weekend was the big hot air balloon race in st. louis) and different than a air plane, it was like a fast hover.  we pulled over and attempted to capture video on our iphones and neither of our videos turned out (strange because i was certain i had the craft in my line of sight).

we watched for about ten minutes and we were fascinated at the fact that the craft made absolutely no sound and the craft seemed to glow and hover in a strange way.
content.summary: Eight glowing lights over the intersection of 40 and 270

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mother grandfather also police officer saw what was seen i contacted wafts twice first night it was single objects no other planes or helicopters. it was at 0300 the time i saw them woke my mom up she was upset to be wakened up finally she came out and said o my god i thought you were crazy my grandmother after witnessed it said i have to go to church i see it but irony believe in it. one hour ago my grandfather seen the ufos . i have connections with local authorities. i always believed in ufos but never seen one. now i have but multiple triangles i saw tonight also watching what i seen makes me wonder why why f16s where flying towards them? but tonight every dog in the neighborhood is barking and no coyotes are heard. my friend when he keyed up on the radio i stated you made a mistake. it's crazy how people don't know the alignment of stars that's how i found them. please get back with me i would really like to show the truth in pearson. and no have not went out public with friends. i hope this organization takes this to the fullest capability. you have my email address.
content.summary: 1st night objects that would circle 2nd none 3rd multiple triangles it was also aired on van zander county radio i witnessed  im a paramedic me my mom police officer saw even my grandmother i told wafts twice about it but there tpnight are fighter

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown

Please someone hase to do something about all the ufo activity around ojai calif. 93023. there is so much more now and i keep seing more. i dont know what more i can do as to what iv ben doing. i fill thats not enough. iv went to them serounded of them it is so raw all of them. the only way to cope is to clear my mind of all thought have no fear and to see each one as buityfull beings and to fell they are my family as i am to them wow they open up to me show me what i am there for. my pashion to them is like a dream. they let me know i am different to others humans that im not like them. they chousen me cause i have a gift witch i dont know yet. the fact that i can go into the mountains and find them is a start.
 they are aware of people atacking me all the time with a powder to distract me cause all you think about is whats on me nothing eles. iv gone to athoritys to get help they dont respond to me well so i ask them for help there sorral is there hor me is there but they cant intervine right now but they were able to hiten my sences to when its time to leave or my enstinks ability to be aware of all that is around and thay gave me a greater gift of pashion for all around me.
   so now i scope acrose the street from the forest serivs building looking above the building into the rocks above shelf road and higher up unto nordhoff ridge . there all over but i am safe from people were i am at

content.summary: They are so many differend kinds of them. i see them in the day time with scops. best time to see is 5pm  till dark thats when they come out of the mountains

content.detailedDescription:
There is so much additional and more recent information to be added to case #58566 that i thought it in the investigators (jean walker) best interest to file this case as part-two.  there has been new information to add to this investigation each week since the initial report.
debbie ziegelmeyer
missouri mufon sd
content.summary: Continuation of case #58566

content.detailedDescription:
Watching florida state vs clemson football game saturday, 9-20-2014 on 720hd television. show was recorded so i am not that sure of time. saw a streak above, beyond stadium, looked like meteorite. have full program saved on dvr. backed show up to before streak, saw white light, took picture of screen with cell phone camera, enlarged picture and it showed multiple lights in close triangular arrangement. phone only has 5.0m lens. kept watching game and saw at least one more occurrence a few minutes later at another angle looking in a different direction,took picture of this occurrence also. show was televised in hd. i thought it was a meteorite until i took a closer look, believe it to be alien, at least to public knowledge of available aircraft.
i saw a gigantic triangular craft while driving through mississippi and alabama in 1999 late at night while traveling from tupelo, ms. to newnan, ga. thought woods were lit up by an airport or high school football game until i saw the craft through moon roof, then thought it was a blimp or aircraft until i realized it was stationary and as big as an aircraft carrier. most of my thoughts were in retrospect as i did not believe there could be a motionless craft of this size and was puzzled at the time. never reported that one. noticed no other traffic at the time, late at night or early morning.
content.summary: Watching fsu/clemson fb game , saw streak of orange trail like falling star.Stopped video and backed up, using frame by frame saw white light, took picture, enlarged shows number of lights in triangle shape some different colors.Blimp in area.

content.detailedDescription: Some friends and myself were staying at a friends apartment for the weekend which overlooks lake shore drive and therefore lake michigan. we were on the balcony having a conversation when i happened to notice a bright orange orb ascending from the lake. i quickly alerted the two other people who were with me to the object and none of us could identify it. when we first noticed it it was perhaps a mile out onto the lake and a couple hundred feet in the air. it was rising diagonally upwards at a slow yet steady velocity. once it reached a certain altitude, it appeared to stop and head east, at which point the brightness of the object quickly diminished. once the object disappeared we resumed our conversation, only to be interrupted by an identical object rising from the lake which followed the same flight path as the last object. once this object disappeared we continued to watch the lake to see if another object would appear and if we could pinpoint its origin. sure enough, about a minute later it looked as if someone lit a fire beneath the surface of the lake or on the surface of the lake from which another orange orb rose, once again following the same flight path until it faded away in the distance. this happened 4 more times over the course of the next 5 minutes, with one orb in particular seeming significantly closer and faster than the rest. my initial thought was that someone was on the lake lighting chinese lanterns, but i was forced to dismiss this idea for several reasons. each object followed the exact same flight path, and seemed much too large be a chinese lantern. there were also no lights from a boat on the lake where somebody could be lighting them off, which from our vantage point we would have most likely been able to see. finally, who would be on the lake after midnight lighting chinese lanterns? after the event we all went inside and prepared to go to sleep, all of us still wondering what we had just witnessed.
content.summary: Series of orange orbs over lake michigan

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped out to smoke a ciggerette. looked up in southern sky and over the treetops i seen thease lights heading north. 1st there were 2 they were flying and a formation both were exactly the same both were in the south but one was further west of the other.  watched them fly the western one dimmed just a little for about 3 seconds and then was gone the other flew for about 25 seconds then another one appeared east of the second one. then the second dimmed for about 3 or 4 seconds and then it disapperaed. the 3 flew for maybe a 60 seconds and then it dimmed and disapeared also. they all was traveling the same speed not super fast but for the distance they were from the ground they were not slow. they were the same color as your amber light on dash boards. i have seen aircraft before i was in the army and know what most aircraft look like. my parents both were pilots. i also live in a flight path of kci airport and have seen many planes or jets fly over and this was not like tradtional aircraft. they were as bright as if you was looking at a street light 4 or 5 blocks away. their was no noise at all. there was a breeze very light comeing from the southeast. they seemed to be in a formation and stayed in that formation up till they disapeared. i called to my mom she came out and looked at them. and she was able to see the second one and third one. also i am 46 years old and have seen a lot of things and never seen anything flying like this. i was not scared or excited at all i just watched and noted what happened i was trying to figure out what it was and be objective about it. i am not going to say this was out of the world stuff but it was not normal lights in the sky.
content.summary: Looked out in the south sky seen glowing lights traveling in formation heading n

content.detailedDescription: The triangle shaped thing was moving slowly to words me and i felt very scared and sick at my stomach and ran inside to wake my husband . it was gone when by the time he got outside.
content.summary: {rjsitting outside at 5am by the campfire drinking my coffee,within 2 to 3 minutes apart huge reddish balls, shot straight path above the treeline same direction, stood up to see where they went and saw a triangle shaped with large ball of light under it,

content.detailedDescription: They are so many around iv been studding and i cant stop . i have a video when they came to me at 330 in the morining after went to the hospital. ben told not to for my health i cant stop i have to study them no one will  the cops make sure im not on drugs thats ok the fire department make sure im ok the forest servis wonders about me cause i scop above there building and use there antanas but i think they all are starting to see there is trouse in what i an telling them in fact the forest servis will help me in my serch in there forest wow..... its so scarry that there are so many ufo ships so close th people. the reason that they are here is that alot of them are born on the earth right in the mountains of our home town. and by that they are not aleans. the problem is that they still scare me when fronted with them but i getting to learn how to not be afraid of them , its been a long road but to any one that has never seen them befor thay seem to be as monsters. the way to overcome the fear is to look into there eyes and see the beauty that they are and let them know your not here to hurt them. then open your mind to pureness that they are all around you. witch im starting to do well. my bigest problem is when its gets dark the fear takes over me and i cant stay and i leave
